title: Clients — Validate portal access and brand preferences
description: Validate portal access functionality and brand preference persistence. Confirm no regression from other layout updates.
acceptanceCriteria: No regressions from other client page changes

steps.description: Test portal access from client page
steps.details: Navigate to portal access settings on a client. Toggle access on/off. Verify the portal user can/cannot log in accordingly.
Set brand preferences for a client (colors, tone, etc.). Save and refresh. Verify preferences persist.
After all other client page changes are complete, verify portal access and brand preferences still work. No broken links or missing data.

technicalNotes: This is a validation task — run after all client page changes are complete
